_comment: Copy this file to datasources.json and update with your Snowflake credentials

_instructions.setup: 1. Copy this file to datasources.json, 2. Update Snowflake credentials (or set SNOWFLAKE_* environment variables), 3. Run: python app.py
_instructions.env_vars: Sensitive fields can be overridden via environment variables: SNOWFLAKE_ACCOUNT, SNOWFLAKE_USER, SNOWFLAKE_PASSWORD, SNOWFLAKE_DATABASE, SNOWFLAKE_SCHEMA, SNOWFLAKE_WAREHOUSE
